mapper.sql: a.verno_ctx AS "vernoCtx", a.iid AS "iid", a.descr AS "descr", a.exclude AS "exclude", a.authsvc AS "authsvc", a.finsvc AS "finsvc", a.ichgsvc AS "ichgsvc", a.fecode AS "fecode", a.scheme AS "scheme", a.allowsvc AS "allowsvc", a.local_use AS "localUse", a.settletype AS "settletype", a.panlens AS "panlens", a.svccodes AS "svccodes", a.luhnlen AS "luhnlen", a.startfmt AS "startfmt", a.endfmt AS "endfmt", a.isslen AS "isslen", a.posniss AS "posniss", a.posnexp AS "posnexp", a.posnstart AS "posnstart", a.posnsvc AS "posnsvc", a.posncvv AS "posncvv", a.posnpvv AS "posnpvv", a.outbtchtype AS "outbtchtype", a.outatmbtchtype AS "outatmbtchtype", a.subaddress AS "subaddress", a.curbill AS "curbill", a.curset AS "curset", a.rateinst_id AS "rateinstId", a.rateprod_id AS "rateprodId", a.emvadvsvc AS "emvadvsvc", a.options AS "options"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crdrouting( verno_ctx, iid, descr, exclude, authsvc, finsvc, ichgsvc, fecode, scheme, allowsvc, local_use, settletype, panlens, svccodes, luhnlen, startfmt, endfmt, isslen, posniss, posnexp, posnstart, posnsvc, posncvv, posnpvv, outbtchtype, outatmbtchtype, subaddress, curbill, curset, rateinst_id, rateprod_id, emvadvsvc, options ) VALUES ( #{vernoCtx}, #{iid}, #{descr}, #{exclude}, #{authsvc}, #{finsvc}, #{ichgsvc}, #{fecode}, #{scheme}, #{allowsvc}, #{localUse}, #{settletype}, #{panlens}, #{svccodes}, #{luhnlen}, #{startfmt}, #{endfmt}, #{isslen}, #{posniss}, #{posnexp}, #{posnstart}, #{posnsvc}, #{posncvv}, #{posnpvv}, #{outbtchtype}, #{outatmbtchtype}, #{subaddress}, #{curbill}, #{curset}, #{rateinstId}, #{rateprodId}, #{emvadvsvc}, #{options} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crdrouting SET verno_ctx = #{vernoCtx}, iid = #{iid}, descr = #{descr}, exclude = #{exclude}, authsvc = #{authsvc}, finsvc = #{finsvc}, ichgsvc = #{ichgsvc}, fecode = #{fecode}, scheme = #{scheme}, allowsvc = #{allowsvc}, local_use = #{localUse}, settletype = #{settletype}, panlens = #{panlens}, svccodes = #{svccodes}, luhnlen = #{luhnlen}, startfmt = #{startfmt}, endfmt = #{endfmt}, isslen = #{isslen}, posniss = #{posniss}, posnexp = #{posnexp}, posnstart = #{posnstart}, posnsvc = #{posnsvc}, posncvv = #{posncvv}, posnpvv = #{posnpvv}, outbtchtype = #{outbtchtype}, outatmbtchtype = #{outatmbtchtype}, subaddress = #{subaddress}, curbill = #{curbill}, curset = #{curset}, rateinst_id = #{rateinstId}, rateprod_id = #{rateprodId}, emvadvsvc = #{emvadvsvc}, options = #{options} WHERE id = #{id}
